column1: Smoque BBQ////I was just sitting around flipping channels when I saw the Diner's Drive-ins and Dives BBQ Masters Episode come on. It reminded me I have been to this place (because I'd seen it on Triple D before going there) and I had never given an online review. I've told anyone in person it's amazing food
column2: but I felt I had to say it here too. The Brisket
column5: everything... it was ALL Delicious. To me atleast. One can only go off personal opinion. Anyone I've spoken to in person enjoyed it and it deserves a 5 stars. Not everyone will enjoy it
